item.title: [Python] [Fixed] I was addicted to the alphanumeric judgment of Python strings.
item.description: *** Addition *** The article was flawed, so please read the additional notes below the text. I’m addicted One day I was writing a web app on Google App Engine (Python). There are times when you want to determine the characters that can be used in passwords in web services, right? When I looked it up, I could use string.isalnum() to check if it was alphanumeric, so I used it.
